DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe alterations of serum ferritin, transferrin saturation, soluble transferrin receptor, % hypochromic erythrocytes, % reticulocytes, reticulocyte hemoglobin content after iron loading in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Iron Markers Following Iron Loading in Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: hemodialysis for three months minimum stable epoetin dose for two months minimum serum ferritin concentration < 1000 ng/ml transferrin saturation < 50% parathormone concentration < 800 pg/ml hemoglobin concentration > 13g/dl serum ferritin concentration < 20 ng/ml vitamin B12 and/or folic deficiency other hematologic disease than anemia cancer hypothyroidism infectious disease
